title: Shocking video shows mostly adult male illegals released and then taken to TX airport

sentence: 1395 comments Congresswoman Debbie Lesko (R-AZ) faced social media ridicule after she added a few too many zeroes to her warning about the size and scale of illegal immigration.
author: Ken Meyer
title: GOP Rep. Mocked for Claiming a Billion Migrants Were Apprehended on Southern Border: This is What Happens When You ‘Ban Math’

sentence: And you wonder why Ron DeSantis, Greg Abbott, and others are so keen to burn math textbooks... Arizona's Republican Congresswoman Debbie Lesko said on Twitter that Border Patrol agents had arrested a billion people at the U.S.-Mexico border over the past six months—wrongly adding three zeros to the correct number of a million people.
author: Ed Scarce
title: AZ Rep Bashed On Twitter, Says A Billion Migrants Apprehended At Border
